attributes.action: Ban the sale of disposable bbq's.
attributes.additional_details: Ban the sale and usage of disposable bbq's in Great Britain
attributes.background: During the summer we all love to have bbq's, however in many areas including The New Forest National Park, prolonged periods of hot, dry weather increase the risk of fires to extremely high levels. Disposable bbq's used in these areas often lead to massive fires, endangering people & wildlife.
